display_long_description:
Players sit at one of four seats around a table and take a shotgun loaded with a random mix of live and dud rounds.
The rules are simple: shoot yourself or shoot another player.
Rounds continue until only one survivor remains.

The shotgun’s pump-action, shell ejection, and trigger feel are recreated with care.
Its weight, handling, and the tension of facing a muzzle create an immersive VR experience.
Ammo patterns change every round, producing natural mind games driven by luck, deduction, and courage.

Gameplay is round-based.
After each shot, the shotgun automatically moves to the next player’s spot.
A monitor arm on the table shows ammo, turn order, and hints without blocking your view.

To heighten the excitement, several special items can be used—ones that let you peek at a round, boost shot power, or take high-risk gambles that change the match.

Designed as a party-style VR experience, MR Real-Shotgun brings players together at one virtual table, mixing fear and laughter in every match.
It works both as a focused small-group challenge and as a lively turn-based party game.

MR Real-Shotgun delivers a simple but intense gun-action experience, making full use of VR and mixed reality.
Feel the tension and enjoy the thrill of pulling the trigger yourself.
